name: DEVSECOPS
body:
### Welcome to the DevSecOps Projects
We are busy creating new projects and posting them here to inspire community involvement and help others with the lessons we've learned. 

While we are busy building out our project pages and documentation, you can check out our projects here: [DevSecOps on Github](https://github.com/devsecops)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
